short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adding transparency to in-video advertisements on Youtube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Why aren't in-video advertisements labeled on Youtube? Transparently uses human-labeled advertisements to efficiently mark ads on a currently limited number of popular videos.

This app is currently in development. If you would like to see how the app will function, after installation visit https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=niz3Shv6QWY.
